article_metadata.title: Donald Trump rallies supporters in Rock Hill | News & Observer

og.description: Calling the 2016 presidential election one of “competence, not niceness,” Republican Donald Trump on Friday night ripped President Barack Obama, Democrat Hillary Clinton and even Washington Republicans.
